scanexam.titleSummary: Current state of the exam marking:
scanexam.alignscanbrpage: Number of pages to use in the exam template
scanexam.question: QUESTION
scanexam.assistanceTooltip: Enables AI for automatic student name detection
scanexam.removealignementTooltip: Enables you to work on non-aligned sheets
scanexam.chargerscan: Load or update a copy scan for the exam:
scanexam.copienotassociated: Copy not associated with a student
scanexam.copienotassociateddetails: It seems that this copy is not associated with a student
scanexam.shareuedetail: Share this module with one or more colleagues because sharing the correction is more fun
scanexam.removeverify: Are you sure you want to delete this module, exams, student groups and associated templates? (This will also remove this module for the colleague(s) with whom this module is shared.) ⚠️ This action is irreversible.
scanexam.removexamveverify: Are you sure you want to delete this exam, the scans and the associated corrections? (This will also remove this exam for the colleague(s) with whom this exam is shared.) ⚠️ This action is irreversible.
scanexam.slogan: Your assesments accessible in one click
scanexam.creeexamcours: Create an exam for the course {{ coursName }}
scanexam.cleancache: Clean the browser cache for this exam
scanexam.cleancachedetail: Clean the browser cache for this exam (images in the local indexdb database)
scanexam.synchrobrowserserver: Synchronize the browser cache to the server for correction on another device
scanexam.synchrobrowserserverdetail: Synchronize the browser cache to the server for a correction on another device (images in the local indexdb database)
scanexam.synchroserverbrowser: Synchronize the browser cache with the server cache
scanexam.synchroserverbrowserdetail: Synchronize the browser's cache with the server's (allows you to import a set of images previously aligned on another device)
scanexam.confirmcleancache: Are you sure you want to delete the cache in the browser? You will need to realign the images
scanexam.confirmuploadcache: Are you sure you want to download the cache from the browser to the server?
scanexam.uploadcacheokdetail: Successful export of the local database
scanexam.uploadcacheko: Cannot not upload file on server
scanexam.uploadcachekodetail: Export of the local database impossible (probably due to the size, it is not too annoying)
scanexam.uploadstudentsheetokdetail: Successful export of the annoted student sheet
scanexam.uploadstudentsheetko: Cannot not upload file on server
scanexam.uploadstudentsheetkodetail: Export of the annoted student sheet impossible (probably due to the size, it is not too annoying)
scanexam.uploadstudentsheetencours: Upload of the annoted student sheet to the server in progress
scanexam.uploadcacheencours: Upload of the image cache to the server in progress
scanexam.confirmdownloadcache: Are sure you want to download the cache from the server to the browser. This will remove your local image database to that equipment previously aligned.
scanexam.downloadcachekodetail: No cache data on the server. Please run the image alignment from this browser
scanexam.nbrligne: Number of rows in table (between 100 and 300)
scanexam.importsuccessdetail: All students are now involved in this module
scanexam.confirmremovestudents: Are you sure you want to delete these student lists?
scanexam.confirmremovestudent: Are you sure you want to delete this student?
scanexam.mailtooltip: the variables ${firstname}, ${url}, ${lastname}, ${note} can be used within the mail body
scanexam.mailsentdetails: All students are now notified of their results
scanexam.mailnotsentdetails: An error occurred while sending emails to students
scanexam.mailtemplate:
Hello ${firstname},

Here is the link to your copy ${url}.
Sincerely,

The teaching team
scanexam.mailabitemplate:
Hello ${firstname},

 You do not have any result for this exam.
Sincerely,

The teaching team
scanexam.showsample: See examples of correct solutions for this question:
scanexam.echangemail: Exchange with the teaching team following a misunderstanding of the correction
scanexam.nobadsolution: No answer with a typical mistake identified
scanexam.penaltytooltip: Cost according to the total points of the current question (e.g. if the total points of the question equals 2 and selection is 1/5, a wrong answer will cost 0,4 pt
scanexam.expressiontooltip: A valid expression will have the format 'a&b|a&c' meaning either box 'a' and box 'b' checked or box 'a' and box 'c' checked ('a' being the first box, 'c' being the third, ...)
scanexam.steptooltip: The question can be scored from 0.25pt to 0.25pt or 0.5pt to 0.5pt for example, whatever the total number of points of the question.
scanexam.couldnotcorrectQCM: Could not correct this QCM automatically
scanexam.couldnotcorrectQCMdetails: Could not correct this QCM automatically
scanexam.nosupportQMCmultiplepage: No support for automatic correction on multiple page MCQs
scanexam.nosupportQMCmultiplepagedetails: No support for automatic correction on multiple page MCQs.
scanexam.exportcacheencours: export cache to send it to server
scanexam.listestudentvalid: Provide a valid list of students and then click on the 'import' button. You can import the list by clicking on the first cell (INE-1) to then paste (ctrl-v) the previously copied list.
scanexam.liststderrorcolsize: Columns must be the same size
scanexam.gobacktomoduledetail: Back to the module view (student list, other exam(s), ...)
scanexam.gobacktomodulelist: Back to the list of modules
scanexam.gobacktomodulelistdetail: Back to the list of modules
scanexam.removetextcommentconfirmation: You are going to delete a comment, it will be deleted for all the copies on which it was applied.
scanexam.removegradedcommentconfirmation: You are going to delete a comment, it will be deleted for all the copies on which it was applied.
scanexam.contientmarqueur: Does your scan contain alignement mark?
scanexam.realign: Realign mage(s) for the current question
scanexam.sqlinsertfile: Inserting the file into the database (this may take some time)
scanexam.shortcutdetail: It is possible to switch from one question to another by using the following keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl + down  (Cmd + down for mac) or Ctrl + up (Cmd + up for mac). It is possible to move from one student to another using the following keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl + right (Cmd + right for mac) or Ctrl + left. (Cmd + left for mac)
scanexam.shortcutopenatstart: Display this window when loading the correction module on this computer
scanexam.removeallbindingtooltip: ⚠️ to be done only if the correction has not started
scanexam.partialalignscantooltip: Mainly used if the scan pdf has been modified (e.g. to flip/reverse some pages) in order not to have to realign the whole set of images
scanexam.alignscantooltip: Launches scan alignment to prepare copies for correction
scanexam.annotatexamtooltip: Step that establishes the correction criteria
scanexam.chargerscantooltip: Upload the pdf file containing the students' scans
scanexam.redresserscantooltip: This step is used to straighten student scans to prepare the correction
scanexam.associerscantooltip: This step associates the copies with the students enrolled in this module
scanexam.corrigerscantooltip: This step is used to grade the copies according to the grading criteria established in step 1
scanexam.resultatsscantooltip: View results and send feedback to students
scanexam.downloadcacheencours: Downloading the image cache from the current server
scanexam.importToDexie: Import in the current local database
scanexam.removeAllAnnotation: Are you sure you want to delete all the annotations for this exam?
scanexam.tooltipCompareComment: Comparison of copies with the same commentary
scanexam.tooltipCompareMark: Comparison of copies with the same score
scanexam.tooltipResetAnswer: Remove the marking for this question and this sheet
scanexam.commentsmanagementtooltip: Comment management for this question (Add, remove, export, import)
scanexam.courseimporttooltip: Import course's data using json format
scanexam.courseexporttooltip: Export course's data using json format
scanexam.importexportcoursetooltip: Import/Export course's data for reusing them
scanexam.exportcoursetooltip: Export course's data for reusing them
scanexam.importcoursetooltip: Import course's data for reusing them
scanexam.adddefaulttooltip: Add default comments (Excellent, wrong answer, void, ...)
scanexam.donneesaimporte: Data to import, click on the button above to import the data
scanexam.voirtoutescopiestooltip: Show all student answers in one page
scanexam.cleanSheetTooltip: It is sometimes the case that certain exam sheets are orphaned, and this operation allows you to examine these unanswered sheets that are not associated with an exam.
scanexam.keyboardshortcuthelp: Enter your keyboard shortcut as: ctrl + e or shift + e (You can view existing shortcuts by clicking on F1)
scanexam.keyboardshortcuttooltip: Associate a keyboard shortcut for this comment
scanexam.resetAllShortCut: Delete all keyboard shortcuts associated with comments
scanexam.classifytooltip: Compute groups images by similarity (you can choose the number of target groups in the left-hand menu: KMean options)
scanexam.applysamegradetooltip: Apply the same grade and comments as the first answer in this answer group.
scanexam.exportpdfokdetails: All exams have been exported as pdf files (accept popupswithin your browser if you did not received them)
scanexam.envoiabi: Sent an email to missing student(s):
scanexam.envoipdf: Send the pdf of the annotated copy as an attachment:
scanexam.voirvignettealigntooltip: Shows (or hides) a preview of the thumbnails of aligned pages
scanexam.npagealigndetails: There is no page to align for the page number =
scanexam.showmapping: View mappings between aligned and non-aligned pages (debug)
scanexam.rotateImageTooltip: Rotate images 180° (If you are in the alignment view, don't forget to force the cache synchronisation if you want that your changes to be visible to other users)
scanexam.deleteImageTooltip: Delete images (If you are on the alignment view, don't forget to force the cache synchronization if you want that your changes to be visible to other users)
scanexam.withmarkertooltip: Black circles in the corners of sheets to align pages
scanexam.withoutmarkertooltip: No significant marker to align the pages (the algorithm will search for points of interest)
scanexam.pdfupload: Loads the pdf file containing all the scanned copies
scanexam.cleancachesession: Problems logging in, click here to clear your browser's cache for this application
scanexam.cleancachesessiondone: The browser's cache has been cleared, you can try to reconnect.
scanexam.libelletooltip: This allows you to give a label to a question (if required)
scanexam.sendirectemail: Send an email with the results for this student
scanexam.concatenationTooltip: Configure whether to create a pdf by merging (concatenating) the existing pdf and the new pdf or to replace the previous scan pdf with the new one (ticked means concatenation).
scanexam.debugTooltip: Displays the result of character detection
scanexam.allbindingsTooltip: Enables analysis to be run on all copies not yet bound
scanexam.bindTooltip: Allows you to associate this sheet with this student
scanexam.filterboundstudentTooltip: Allows you to filter students already assigned
scanexam.validaterecognizedTooltip: Allows you to associate the recognised student with this copy. This action can also be called using the keyboard shortcut ctrl + enter.
scanexam.gotonextnonboundsheet: Go to the next sheet not associated with a student
scanexam.gotopreviousnonboundsheet: Go to the previous sheet not associated with a student
scanexam.numeroTooltip: Question number for this zone. Several zones can be associated with the same number
scanexam.typequestionTooltip: Type of this question (MCQ for questions which have an answer in the form of a black box or manual for questions which will be marked manually by the marker
scanexam.manualgradetypequestionTooltip: When a question is marked manually by the marker, the latter can either assign an exact mark for an answer, or make comments which add or subtract points. The advantage of this type of marking is that it is possible to weight the marks assigned to a comment during the marking process and thus dynamically update the mark scheme
scanexam.nbrepageintemplateTooltip: Number of pages per student copy. (This figure is calculated automatically from the number of pages in the template). ⚠️ The number of pages in the scan must be exactly equal to the number of copies scanned multiplied by the number of pages in the template.)
scanexam.showmappingTooltip: Allows you to see the points of interest used to create the alignment. This often helps you to understand why problems during the scan of the copies caused difficulties during the alignment of the copies.
scanexam.showLayoutOptionsTooltip: Allows you to modify certain options associated with the name detection algorithm on copies
scanexam.showPaginatorTooltip: Allows you to navigate between scanned copies to assign them to one or more students in this module
scanexam.showFullPageTooltip: Allows you to view the scanned copy (in a modal window)
scanexam.factorTooltip: Allows you to increase the size of the zones (first name, last name, ine)
scanexam.gotonextnonboundsheetTooltip: Allows you to bind this recognised student with this copy
scanexam.showLayoutOptionsCorrectionTooltip: Allows you to change certain options associated with marking copies
scanexam.showPaginatorQuestionCorrectionTooltip: Allows you to navigate between questions for this paper. Ctrl + down (Cmd + down for Mac User) or Ctrl + up (Cmd + up for Mac User)
scanexam.showPaginatorCopieCorrectionTooltip: Navigates between copies of this question. Ctrl + left (Cmd + left for Mac User) or Ctrl + right (Cmd + right for Mac User)
scanexam.noAlignTooltip: Allows you to work from the unaligned sheets (useful when the alignment process has gone wrong)
scanexam.factorQuestionTooltip: Increases the size of the zones for this question (useful if the students have written outside the zones)
scanexam.shiftPageQuestionTooltip: Allows you to shift the pages (useful if a page is missing or if a sheet has been inserted during the scan). ⚠️ It is preferable and more comfortable to clean up the scan pdf when the scan is loaded via the thumbnail view
scanexam.starAnswerTooltip: Tag this response as an excellent response. It will be used to generate a standard answer key. Several answers can be tagged as excellent
scanexam.worstAnswerTooltip: Tag this answer as an outstanding (wrong) answer. This will allow you to find it quickly during the correction, for example to explain why this answer was not correct
scanexam.showLayoutOptionsCompareTooltip: Allows you to modify some options associated with the comparison layout or the clustering algorithm
scanexam.downloadAllTooltip: Allows you to download all the images (mainly for offline testing of automatic correction techniques).
scanexam.gotoCorrectionTooltip: Return to the correction (last corrected question).
scanexam.nbreClusterTooltip: Sets the number of clusters targeted by the clustering algorithm.
scanexam.showresultLienProfTooltip: Returns you to the correction view for this student
scanexam.showresultLienEleveTooltip: Allows you to see the view visible to the student after the correction has been sent (this is also useful for managing the sending of results without going through the platform).
scanexam.showresultLienPdfTooltip: Allows you to see the annotated pdf that will be generated if you choose to attach this pdf to the result email
scanexam.envoiemailTooltip: Allows you to configure the message and then send an email to students with the result of this exam
scanexam.exportExcelTooltip: Export the table below in Excel format. This export also contains the raw data for each question.
scanexam.voirStatistiquesTooltip: Provides a view with a number of statistics for this exam. Statistics, by student, by question, etc...
scanexam.voirReponsesRepresentativeTooltip: Lists the answers tagged as excellent or outstanding for each question
scanexam.envoiemailPdfTooltip: If ticked, an annotated pdf of the student's copy will be attached to this email. ⚠️ each email size will be larger.
scanexam.envoiemailAbsentTooltip: If ticked, an email will be sent to students who were absent during the exam.
scanexam.envoiemailActionTooltip: Send to each student with the above message body.
scanexam.statToggleValueTooltip: Toggles between raw and normalized values
scanexam.voirCopieStatistiquesTooltip: Go to the correction view for this student
scanexam.voirCopieFullPageTooltip: View the scanned copy for this student (in a modal window).
scanexam.pasdepageassocieeNextTooltip: There is no more sheet to associate following this sheet.
scanexam.pasdepageassocieePreviousTooltip: There is no sheet to associate prior to this sheet
scanexam.replacealignementWithNonAlignTooltip: Replaces the aligned version with the non-aligned version for this sheet
scanexam.pasdepageassocieeTooltip: There is no more sheet to associate for this exam
scanexam.nbreCoreTooltip: The more cores you use to perform this alignment operation, the more CPU and memory resources you will consume. Don't hesitate to lower this number if this step is too demanding on your browser.
scanexam.showAlignementOptionsTooltip: Enables you to modify certain options associated with the sheet alignment algorithm
scanexam.editCommentTooltip: Edit the values for this comment (even if the title or description have not been defined beforehand)
scanexam.fontsizeTooltip: Used to adjust the font size
scanexam.colourTooltip: Choice of color for text and lines
scanexam.scalefactorTooltip: Used to change the page scaling factor
scanexam.gotoCorrectionTooltipView: Used to go to the correction view when you are logged in as a teacher
scanexam.editquestionTooltip: Enables you to edit the properties of the question to update the scoring
